description:
**This dashboard provides observability for your vLLM deployment with the vLLM Integration.**

title: vLLM Overview

definition.content: **This dashboard provides observability for your vLLM deployments with the vLLM Integration.**
Here you can see an overview of your vLLM performance.
Here you can see token-level performance as well as overall request latency.
Dive deeper to see how vLLM is using the GPU.
Dive deeper to see how vLLM is using the CPU.
vLLM runs in Python, a language with a garbage collector to reclaim memory. This garbage collector collects objects in generations. You can see how each generation of objects gets processed.
